text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Mist and fog later. Light rain at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. Mist and fog at first. A few light rain patches. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
